Song.title: My Hope
Song.copyright: Alyssa Mellinger | Ed Kerr | Paul Baloche | Sheila Rabe Â© 2010 Integrity Worship Music (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing (IMI))

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: N[Gm7]othing will change if [Eb]all the plans I make go wrong Your l[Bb]ove stays the same Your [Fsus]light will guide me thr[F]ough it all I'm ha[Eb]nging on I'm l[Fsus]eaning in [F] to [Gm7]You [Eb]
Verse 2: N[Gm7]othing can reach the [Eb]end of all Your faithfulness Your gr[Bb]ace is with me Through [Fsus]ev'ry shadow e[F]v'ry test I'm ha[Eb]nging on I'm l[Fsus]eaning in [F] to [Gm7]You [Eb]
Pre-Chorus: [Eb]I don't know w[Gm7]here You'll [Fsus]take me [F] But [Eb]I know You're a[Gm7]lways [Fsus]good [F]
Chorus: [Bb] My hope is built on no[F]thing less [Gm7] Than Your great love Your [Eb]righteousness [Bb] I will not walk an[F]other way [Gm7] I trust Your heart I [Eb]trust Your Name I'm h[Fsus]olding on [F] [Gm7] [Eb] I'm h[Fsus]olding on [F] to [Eb]You
Instr: [Bb F Gm7 Eb]
To Bridge: [F Gm7 Eb Fsus F Eb]
{new_page} Verse 3: [Gm7]You are my Rock when st[Eb]orms are raging all around You sh[Bb]elter me God I'm [Fsus]safe with You on s[F]olid ground I'm ha[Eb]nging on I'm l[Fsus]eaning in [F] to [Gm7]You [Eb]
Bridge: Oh [Bb] I'm holding on [F] I'm holding on to [Gm7]You I'm holding on [Eb] I'm holding on to Y[Bb]ou (3X) I'm holding on [F] I'm holding on to [Gm7]You I'm holding on [Eb] I'm holding on to Y[Bb]ou [F] I'm holding on to [Gm7]You [Eb] I'm holding on to Y[Bb]ou holding on [F] I'm holding on to [Gm7]You [Eb]I'm holding on to You
Ending: [Bb] My hope is built on no[F]thing less [Gm7] Than Your great love Your [Eb]righteousness [Bb] I will not walk an[F]other way [Gm7] I trust Your heart I [Eb]trust Your Name
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 nothing will change if all the plans i make go wrong your love stays the same your light will guide me through it all im hanging on im leaning in to you verse 2 nothing can reach the end of all your faithfulness your grace is with me through evry shadow evry test im hanging on im leaning in to you prechorus i dont know where youll take me but i know youre always good chorus my hope is built on nothing less than your great love your righteousness i will not walk another way i trust your heart i trust your name im holding on im holding on to you instr to bridge verse 3 you are my rock when storms are raging all around you shelter me god im safe with you on solid ground im hanging on im leaning in to you bridge oh im holding on im holding on to you im holding on im holding on to you 3x im holding on im holding on to you im holding on im holding on to you im holding on to you im holding on to you holding on im holding on to you im holding on to you ending my hope is built on nothing less than your great love your righteousness i will not walk another way i trust your heart i trust your name
